name: ULTRAQUEST [Student Project]
description:
THIS IS A STUDENT PROJECT. I AM VERY SORRY HAKITA.

The purpose of this project was to create assets for a template game in Unity in the style of an existing game. The framework chosen was 'Quest', a simple game in which the player just talks to an NPC, moves around with a 3rd person controller and collects 3 items. 

The game chosen for the asset style was ULTRAKILL. And so this is the story of 'V2' being trapped somewhere in the desert in 4-2 GOD DAMN THE SUN and hitching a lift with a Sentry Robot after fixing a dune buggy so he could be on time for the showdown with V1 in 4-4 CLAIR DE SOLEIL.

Controls: WASD to move. Q and E to rotate camera - it will sort out it's own vertical position :]. Shift to sprint. F to interact. Use the mouse to click on the dialogue options.

Assets used:

FREE Casual Game SFX Pack - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
ArbaA Experimental Chaabi - Layali - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FfljKx9NpUc 
'Quest Template' & all assets therein - https://github.com/RKerrSAE/Quest_Template

All other visual assets - 3D models, UI and otherwise - made my myself.
